snippet: Mr. Kanzaburo, whose career spanned five decades, initially immersed himself in the Kabuki classics before forging his own path both in Japan and worldwide.
abstract: Kanzaburo Nakamura XVIII, a star of Japan’s Kabuki theater who broke from tradition to bring the stylized art form to younger generations and audiences overseas, dies at age 57.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Kanzaburo, whose career spanned five decades, initially immersed himself in the Kabuki classics before forging his own path both in Japan and worldwide.

headline.seo: Kanzaburo Nakamura, Kabuki Star, Dies at 57
headline.main: Kanzaburo Nakamura, Stalwart of Kabuki, Dies at 57
